document_title: FortiManager and FortiAnalyzer Persistent XSS vulnerability

note.text: An XSS vulnerablity in FortiManager/FortiAnalyzer could allow privileged guest user accounts and restricted user accounts to inject malicious script to the application-side or client-side of the appliance web-application; this potentially enables XSS attacks.
note.title: Summary

note.text: An XSS vulnerablity in FortiManager/FortiAnalyzer could allow privileged guest user accounts and restricted user accounts to inject malicious script to the application-side or client-side of the appliance web-application; this potentially enables XSS attacks.
